name: TuberculosisTestsForMycobacteriumTuberculosisNucleicAcid
title: Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium tuberculosis Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium tuberculosis Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA, rRNA, probe;  

LOINC search: "Mycobacterium tuberculosis probe -avium -gordonae -complex -sp -kansasii -device -intracellulare"),(Exclusion Criteria: implanted device = system; Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex)
